title: ninnu namminaanu
sahitya:
ninnu namminAnu jananI brhannAyaki



anupallavi



 kannatalli nIvu gAdA karuNa cEsi nannu kAva vEgamu rAvE kamala lOcani ambA



caraNam



 shankarI shAmbhavI gaurI duSTha caNDamuNDAsura vairi mangaLadAyini

 mAni harikEshapuri rANi sankaTamu tIrcci brOvu sakala lOka pAlini
